page.title: 18CHILDRENS LEISURE TIME
page.content: Children's leisure time was mainly centred within the locality and varied according to age. There are no longer cinema facilities in our area the cinemas having long given way to bingo halls so entertainment was limited. in the seven to ten age group the main interests appear to be bicycle riding, swimming, the use of the local parks, particularly those with swings and roundabouts, playing pop records, watching video films and Brownie and Cub movements. In the eleven to fourteen age group, the interests were disco dancing, scout and guides, sports, youth clubs and home computers. Some children have horses which they ride. In most areas like our own there are community centres financed by the local council and in these centres more organised activities take place.
